author: Staff Reporter
text:
The West Bengal government is leaving no stone unturned to ensure that the much-anticipated performance of Ghazal maestro Ghulam Ali on Tuesday goes without any untoward incident.

Close to 1,000 police personnel will be deployed at the Netaji Indoor Stadium, where Mr. Ali will perform.

“A contingent of more than 800 personnel led by eight Deputy Commissioners of Police will be deployed at the venue apart from personnel in plain clothes,” Joint Commissioner of Police (Headquarters) Supratim Sarkar said on Monday.

Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee is expected to attend the concert, say police officials.
title: Tight security for Ghulam Ali’s concert
